name: SKPaymentTransaction
desc: An object in the payment queue.

items.name: var transactionIdentifier: String?
items.desc: A string that uniquely identifies a successful payment transaction.

items.name: var transactionDate: Date?
items.desc: The date the transaction was added to the App Storeâ€™s payment queue.

items.name: var original: SKPaymentTransaction?
items.desc: The transaction that was restored by the App Store.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An object describing the error that occurred while processing the transaction.

items.name: var downloads: [SKDownload]
items.desc: An array of download objects representing the downloadable content associated with the transaction.

items.name: var transactionState: SKPaymentTransactionState
items.desc: The current state of the transaction.

items.name: enum SKPaymentTransactionState
items.desc: Values representing the state of a transaction.
